ErlichLiu/DeepClaude

DeepClaude: Combines DeepSeek R1 and Claude 3.5 for AI reasoning and coding

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • LLM API and chat UI combining DeepSeek R1 reasoning traces with Claude models
  • DeepSeek-R1 GitHub repo with model code and info
  • n8n node for DeepSeek AI automations
  • Data analysis platform using large language models
  • DeepEP — communication library for Mixture-of-Experts and expert parallelism, with all-to-all GPU kernels and low-precision support
  • List of projects, tools, and resources for integrating DeepSeek AI models with other platforms
  • unified multimodal model for both understanding and generating images and text
  • Framework for building AI agent tools for Deepseek Reasoner
